Reviews.Title: Very good, a cute little Galaxy phone
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: Ok, I got the phone yesterday, but I didn't order it here, so I'm only gonna talk about the device itself.It's very light, very skinny, and though I don't like the color that much, it does pop out in my purse so I never lose it.The camera's decent, but the real treat here is the audio quality, which is remarkable.The charger has a weird form, and I still have sort of a hard time plugging it in, so I'm working on figuring a way. I still can't a skin cover OR a screen protector.The keyboard is VERY small, so make sure you're ready to buy a stylus, or at least train your dexterity.I don't like the fact that the music button plays your songs with a single click- I'm scared it might go off when I need serious silent mode. This is easily solvable by pulling down the multimedia volume.The interface is simple as can be. Android's Ice Cream Sandwich is a considerably fast OS compared to Gingerbread, which I used in a tablet before. Yet, make sure you don't open TOO many apps. I've been able to watch an episode on Netflix without the slightest trouble. The RAM builds up quite fast, but then again, it helps if you periodically force a cleanup in the settings menu.Conclusion: Buy it if you can handle a teeny tiny phone and don't plan to use big-ass apps like Document Readers or Angry Birds Star Wars.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: robert wayne kennedy
Reviews.Content: I received my phone well packed for shipping. The FM radio tuner works fine. The phone is loud, not terribly loud but I can hear with it even with my hearing loss. The cheap ear buds that came with the phone could have been omitted. The only thing that kept me from giving the phone 5 stars is the fact that I have to wiggle the micro usb cable/charger to get it to seat in the phone. Considering the price and that it is aimed at the youth market, I can deal with it. The screen is somewhat small at 3 inches, no false advertising there, but I find it adequate as I am not watching movies on my phone. If the larger screen is important to you phones with 3.5 inch screens can be had for $50 more from the same manufacturer that still have the same dual sim capability. No flash but takes a decent picture when there is enough light. Battery life for me with heavy usage of applications lasts 1.5 days which I consider adequate for calls, data, texts, internet and viber. I just charge it nightly. Of course if I usb tether it to my laptop as a hotspot, it charges off the laptop battery. It's a good budget phone with android 4.04 icecream sandwich operating system. The screen is old/budget tech, not quite as clear as more expensive phones, but still good. If you need a capable dual sim smart phone on a budget, I would recommend this one, even cheaper would be the galaxy y.

Reviews.Title: I really like it
Reviews.Author: vejorge
Reviews.Content: Great stuff, excellent performance and work perfectly with my carrier (Movistar) in Venezuela. Really amazing work with android os, faster and easy

Reviews.Title: Dual sim
Reviews.Author: AndrewL
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, read, and maneuver.  Bonus its a Samsung.  Quality product easy to use and to work with expandable memory.

Reviews.Title: The best quality music i have ever heard in a phone
Reviews.Author: Manuel Moura
Reviews.Content: Samsung says this equipment is developed for playing music, i say it is trueSamsung says the equipment plays good quality music, i say the best in a cellphone columnsSamsung says it has dolby surround, i believeSamsung says it is a very good android equipment i ensure that it is trueI have to tell Sansung it deserves better quality headphones and a bigger displayThe price is very good for this wonderful cellphoneThank you SamsungManuel Moura

Reviews.Title: Thrilled...till the bottom dropped out!
Reviews.Author: munchkin
Reviews.Content: After months of searching all brands the curiosity about this phone got me. Loved , Loved, Loved it...Loved the color.  Loved the size (at times wished for a bit larger screen) Though a bit heavy in the pocket - Loved how it felt in my hand. The sound and volume phenomenal !!! Which is why I leaned toward Samsung. So used it on and off mostly for music and shopping on the web since I bought it primarily to use down in another country (so my cell service didn't work here). Which is also why a dual sim. One of these days the people of the US will be allowed freedom from phone plans. The point being my Duos wasn't really getting much use. Then on day 30...internet screen crashed! The internet screen blacked out never to be seen again. AUGH!!![ASIN:B00B06LP7K Samsung Galaxy Music DUOS S6012 Unlocked GSM Phone with Dual SIM, Android 4.0 OS, Multi-Touchscreen, 3.15MP Camera, Vide]].

Reviews.Title: Rubbish
Reviews.Author: Jasi C
Reviews.Content: Had the phone less than 48 hours and it appears to have decided it doesn't want to work any more. no provocation or carelessness, it was sat on the work top and when i went back to it there was a blank screen and it wont turn on or do anything. Definitely returning it  - very very disappointed because it seemed a nice little phone that met my  needs perfectly.

Reviews.Title: cell phone.
Reviews.Author: roy m. beckman
Reviews.Content: not what we expected. was not the operating system that we were told. much smaller than expected. bad bad bad

Reviews.Title: Good Android phone
Reviews.Author: Francis Lyew-Kong
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a newer Android release and this phone with Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) fit the bill. It's my first Android phone and I'm impressed with the features. It is just the right size for my wife's pocketbook.

Reviews.Title: its nice
Reviews.Author: nilaypatel
Reviews.Content: i like all the features and i buyed it from my fist salary thats the main reSON for my purchase.....

Reviews.Title: Small size but too slow phone
Reviews.Author: Mohamed Mashaly
Reviews.Content: It has good small size and nice blue color but very slow mobile and I didn't like it at all

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: C. S. Newman
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. It's the perfect size and works with all my android apps. Love the FM radio and stereo speakers. The dual sims work perfectly so I don't need to carry my work and personal phones all the time. All that for an incredibly low, no contract price.

Reviews.Title: Smart Little Phone
Reviews.Author: BS Webb
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to a first-time smart phone user. All the facilities of a smart phone in an attractive, sonic package.

Reviews.Title: Music phone indeed
Reviews.Author: T Marshall
Reviews.Content: The loud speaker on this phone is louder than many of the music phones I have come across.  It works well with the 8gb sd card I purchase separately, although I had to format the sd card on the phone before it started working.  The dedicated music button is easy to come on or off in error because for the location it is in.  The headphones are pretty cheap in terms of quality, however the quality of sound from these headphones is pretty neat (superb).  Apart for listening to music with the headphones, there is nothing else you can do expect answering an incoming call.  There is no mechanism on the headphones to forward the next song of adjust the volume like other headphones would do, (I guess this feature would have made the phone more expensive).  All in all it’s a pretty neat phone, beautifully design; however the screen size would limited but still does the job.  This is a true music phone and I love.

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: Andres
Reviews.Content: Product came broken, the screen didn't work. I lost time as I needed to shipp it again to Amazon and needed to order a new phone

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Android OS, v4.0.4 (Ice Cream Sandwich); TFT capacitive touchscreen; Dual SIM
Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, Wi-Fi hotspot; Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP
3.15MP (2048 x 1536 pixels) w/ Geo-tagging and touch focus; HTML5 Browser
Stereo FM radio with RDS; built-in antenna - SRS sound enhancement; 4 GB, 512 MB RAM + microSD up to 32 GB
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Music DUOS S6012 Unlocked GSM Phone with Dual SIM, Android 4.0 OS
